body.head:
Songs from a Free Space“
Astrology Hype Corole Ramer
body.p: While in prison six months my horoscope predicted: "Travel to exciting places. New career opportunities. Romance and adventure." So far—l've traveled from jail to Manhattan Supreme Court. My pay scale has increased from 10 to 259 per hour. Numerous other inmates have made overtly sexual advances to me in vacant stairwells. Honey, that's not my idea of a rising sign.
*From Songs From a Free Space/Writings by Women in Prison, edited by Carol Muske and Gail Rosenblum, New Vork, n.d.
